com.final_project.calculator_tobiash.classes

Class AdvancedCalculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.final_project.calculator_tobiash.classes.BasicCalculator
      • com.final_project.calculator_tobiash.classes.AdvancedCalculator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CalculatorAdvancedOperationsInterface, CalculatorBasicOperationsInterface

    public class AdvancedCalculator
extends BasicCalculator
implements CalculatorAdvancedOperationsInterface
    Class AdvancedCalculator. Extends BasicCalculator. An implementation of an advanced calculator. includes six advanced operations in arithmetics. The methods requires double as parameters and returns a double value.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Tobias Hedkvist
